Name: Protect Personal Information
Description: Personal Information of a patient needs to be safeguarded to ensure that the information is only accessed by and visible to the people that have the necessary roles and permissions.

Name: Protect Personal Identifiable Information
Description: Protect identifying information such as Passport, Driver's License Number, Social Security Number and Date of Birth for individuals.

Name: Protect Sensitive Personal Information
Description: Sensitive personal information such as Race Gender and Ethnicity of an individual should be hidden.
